author: Maria Akram
text:
The Aam Admi Party government is all set to act against news channels that broadcast doctored videos of the February 9 JNU incident.

It has reportedly asked its legal team to approach the court against them.

A magisterial probe instituted by the Delhi government had found that three of the seven videos of the event in circulation were doctored, a claim corroborated by Hyderabad-based Truth Labs forensic report.

Sources said the government’s legal team has been asked to initiate action against four channels whose names were not mentioned in the report compiled by the New Delhi District Magistrate, Sanjay Kumar.
title: Delhi to move court against channels
